name: Despair the Dragonlord
text:
2 Tuners + 3 non-Tuner Dragon Monsters
This monster can only be Synchro Summoned or Special summoned by its own effect. If this synchro summoned monster is destoyed by battle you can banished the monsters used to summon this card then you can special summon this card. This card is uneffected by card effects
